channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Man Dies From Burger in First Death Linked to Meat Allergy Spread by Ticks
item.description: The healthy 47-year-old man from New Jersey developed a fatal allergic reaction hours after attending a barbeque in summer 2024.

item.title: Best Buy drops early Black Friday doorbusters – I've got the 12 best deals on TVs, laptops, appliances, headphones, and more
item.description: I've looked through the latest set of deals in the early Black Friday sale at Best Buy and picked out the 12 top offers that I recommend buying now.

item.title: The Data Center Resistance Has Arrived
item.description: A new report finds that local opposition to data centers skyrocketed in the second quarter of this year.

item.title: Apple’s last-gen AirPods Pro 2 are down to their lowest price to date
item.description: Walmart on Friday officially kicked off its early Black Friday deals, with the first wave of discounts lasting from November 14th to November 16th. One of the best deals we’ve spotted is on the last-gen AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C charging case, which are currently $139 ($110 off). That’s even lower than the discount we […]

item.title: Black Friday 2025 : quelles sont les offres encore disponibles ce week-end ?
item.description: Avant le coup d'envoi officiel du vendredi noir à la fin du mois, les offres se multiplient et deviennent de plus en plus intéressantes. D'un côté, il y a le pré-Black Friday chez la majorité des e-commerçants français comme Boulanger, Fnac Darty, Amazon et Cdiscount, et de l'autre côté, il y a aussi le Singles Day, ou 11.11, chez AliExpress et consorts. Vous retrouverez les meilleures offres des deux événements dans cet article. ...

item.title: Black Friday en avance : envie d’une tablette ? Le top des offres pour s’offrir un iPad, Galaxy Tab, Redmi Tab…
item.description: Les tablettes tactiles ne sont certes plus totalement les stars qu’elles étaient, mais elles conservent un réel intérêt, notamment pour le dessin numérique avec un stylet. À l’occasion du pré-Black Friday qui dure jusqu'à la fin du mois, plusieurs modèles de grandes marques profitent de belles réductions.

item.title: Belkin is recalling its iPhone tracking stand and two power banks due to fire risks
item.description: Belkin has issued a recall for its Auto-Tracking Stand Pro for the iPhone and two versions of its 20,000mAh BoostCharge USB-C PD Power Bank because a “manufacturing defect may cause the products’ lithium-ion cell components to overheat,” posing a fire and burn risk to users. While there’s been just one report of a fire in […]

item.title: Intel Panther Lake CPU leak suggests integrated GPUs are getting a potentially game-changing leap in performance
item.description: Intel Core Ultra X7 358H leak shows just how good this CPU might be for handhelds and budget gaming laptops.

item.title: Get the Ultimate PC Upgrade with Snapdragon
item.description: Choose from the fastest PCs with multi-day battery life

item.title: Why we’re going to keep talking about the Trump phone
item.description: For the past couple of weeks, I’ve been asking — repeatedly — where the promised Trump phone is, whether it exists, and what happened to all the money people have already paid for deposits. And I’m going to keep doing that every week for the foreseeable future. Not everyone thinks I should. I’ve been told […]

item.title: Amazon multiplie les offres pour le week-end du pré-Black Friday : le TOP 20 des deals
item.description: Amazon lance déjà ses premières promotions avant le Black Friday et baisse fortement les prix sur de nombreux produits Tech. Découvrez dès maintenant les meilleures offres à ne pas manquer.

item.title: La technologie se met au service du plaisir : voici les innovations qui rendent les sextoys LELO uniques [Sponso]
item.description: En misant autant sur le design que sur la technologie, LELO veut faire entrer les objets de plaisir dans le quotidien. Des sextoys que l'on retrouve justement en promotion pour le Black Friday.

item.title: Need cheap noise-canceling over-ear headphones now? My favorite JLabs just got a huge 38% discount –here's why they're $49 well spent
item.description: I loved these JLab headphones at their original MSRP, and now, they're a stone cold steal

item.title: These Wooden Wireless Earbuds Claim to Self-Heal Small Scratches
item.description: JVC Kenwood's Wood Master wireless earbuds are looking like stiff competition.

item.title: Samsung The Frame 2025 : ce beau TV-tableau de 55 pouces est à un super prix pour le pré-Black Friday chez Fnac et Darty
item.description: La star des salons arty revient en 2025 avec une dalle QLED qui envoie du 144 Hz, un processeur boosté à l’IA et, Black Friday oblige, un prix presque artistique. Le Samsung The Frame TQ55LS03F tombe à 899 euros au lieu de 1 499 euros sur la Fnac et même chez Darty.

item.title: Netflix’s first TV party games including Pictionary are now available to play for free, but we’ll have to wait for the Knives Out spin-off
item.description: Netflix games gets huge refresh with six new party challenges to play on your TV – but the best of the bunch has set no release date.

item.title: Fnac et Darty se montrent bien généreux pour le week-end du pré-Black Friday avec ces 23 offres
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday bat son plein chez les différents e-commerçants français. Évidemment, la Fnac et Darty sont de la partie pour vous faire de belles économies. Voici les meilleurs produits Tech en promotion que l’on recommande à cette occasion.

item.title: The Steam Machine Is Not Built for Hardcore PC Gamers
item.description: And that’s totally okay.

item.title: Weight-Loss Drug Zepbound Is Being Tested as a Treatment for Long Covid
item.description: GLP-1s are being studied for a wide range of conditions. Now, scientists will test whether their anti-inflammatory properties can help alleviate symptoms of long Covid.

item.title: DoorDash confirms serious data breach - customer names, addresses, emails are more all leaked, here's what we know
item.description: It's playing down the importance of the breach but victims are speaking out.

item.title: Carol’s Rant on This Week’s ‘Pluribus’ Suggests Yet Another Meaning Behind the Show
item.description: Apple TV’s sci-fi hit explores a world where (nearly) everyone shares the same brain.

item.title: Oldest RNA Ever Recovered Captures a Woolly Mammoth’s Dying Moments
item.description: A new study opens the door to a whole new world of ancient genome research.

item.title: 9 reasons why you should consider onsite LLM training and inferencing
item.description: Onsite LLM deployment isn't cheap, but there are many reasons to it beats a third-party service.

item.title: Databricks: 'PDF parsing for agentic AI is still unsolved' — new tool replaces multi-service pipelines with single function
item.description: There is a lot of enterprise data trapped in PDF documents. To be sure, gen AI tools have been able to ingest and analyze PDFs, but accuracy, time and cost have been less than ideal. New technology from Databricks could change that.The company this week detailed its "ai_parse_document" technology, now integrated with Databricks' Agent Bricks platform. The technology addresses a critical bottleneck in enterprise AI adoption: Approximately 80% of enterprise knowledge remains locked in PDFs, reports and diagrams that AI systems struggle to accurately process and understand."It's a common assumpti...

item.title: Boulanger liquide ses stocks pour le week-end du pré-Black Friday : les 23 deals à saisir
item.description: Depuis fin octobre, Boulanger lance ses offres pré-Black Friday avec jusqu’à 40 % de réduction sur de nombreux produits tech, dont smartphones, TV, ordinateurs portables et appareils audio. Découvrez celles qui valent le détour.

item.title: ChatGPT Group Chats are here... but not for everyone (yet)
item.description: It was originally found in leaked code and publicized by AI influencers on X, but OpenAI has made it official: ChatGPT now offers Group Chats, allowing multiple users to join the same, single ChatGPT conversation and send messages to each other and the underlying large language model (LLM), online and via its mobile apps. Imagine adding ChatGPT as another member of your existing group chats, allowing you to text it as you would one of your friends or family members and have them respond as well, and you'll have an idea of the intriguing power and potential of this feature.However, the feature ...

item.title: Souveraineté européenne : ces 40 organisations appellent à miser sur l’IA open source
item.description: 45 organisations dont Mozilla et Mistral AI demandent aux dirigeants français, allemand et européen de miser sur l'intelligence artificielle open source pour réduire leur dépendance aux modèles d'IA propriétaires et favoriser la construction d'une souveraineté numérique.

item.title: Netflix change la donne : jouez sur votre télé sans console grâce à votre smartphone, voici comment faire
item.description: Jusqu’ici le service Netflix Gaming était uniquement disponible sur les smartphones mais depuis peu, il est possible de jouer aussi directement sur votre téléviseur, sans avoir besoin de console ou de manettes spécifiques. On vous explique tout.

item.title: « C’est dangereux en soi » : le patron de Perplexity AI met en garde contre les compagnons IA
item.description: Alors que de plus en plus d'internautes développent des relations fortes avec les chatbots, le PDG de Perplexity AI tire la sonnette d'alarme.

item.title: German court rules Google must pay €572M for violating antitrust rules in price comparison sector
item.description: A German court has found that Google has abused its dominant market position in the price comparison sector, ruling that the company must pay a total of €572 million ($665.6 million) in damages to two German price comparison companies.

item.title: Global mining giant BHP is found liable in Brazil’s worst environmental disaster
item.description: High Court Justice Finola O’Farrell said that Australia-based BHP was responsible, despite not owning the dam at the time, finding its negligence, carelessness, or lack of skill led to the collapse. A London judge ruled Friday that global mining company BHP Group is liable in Brazil’s worst environmental disaster when a dam collapse a decade ago unleashed tons of toxic waste into a major river, killing 19 people and devastating villages downstream.High Court Justice Finola O’Farrell said that Australia-based BHP was responsible, despite not owning the dam at the time, finding its negligence, c...

item.title: Project Kuiper devient Amazon Leo, la riposte satellitaire d’Amazon face à Starlink
item.description: Changement de cap stratégique chez Amazon : le concurrent de Starlink quitte le nom de code « Project Kuiper » et s’appelle désormais Amazon Leo. Cette nouvelle étape n’intervient pas n’importe quand, mais juste avant que le géant américain s’apprête à lancer son service internet par satellite en orbite basse.

item.title: WhatsApp to launch third-party chat integration in Europe soon
item.description: Users in Europe who have opted in to the third-party integration will be able to share messages, images, voice messages, videos, and files.

item.title: CISA warns exploited Cisco flaws are a serious risk, so patch now
item.description: Some agencies failed to properly apply Cisco patch and thought they were safe, CISA warns.

item.title: In Ancient Egypt, Opium Was a ‘Fixture of Daily Life,’ Study Suggests
item.description: Researchers analyzed brown residue in an incredibly rare alabaster vase.

item.title: 8 Best MagSafe Phone Grips (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Take the strain off with these comfortable, durable, and lightweight smartphone grips.

item.title: Picture this: A DTC-era company that’s thriving
item.description: Framebridge, the custom framing company, survived the DTC winter by not chasing the cool kids. An object lesson in survival from one of the last market bubbles. In the late 2010s, at the height of the direct-to-consumer boom, Framebridge founder Susan Tynan was green with envy. Many other venture-backed startups from the era—like Casper, Away, and Glossier—were growing much faster than her custom framing business. ...

item.title: All MAGA Wanted Was the Epstein Files. Now They're Ignoring Them
item.description: For years, MAGA influencers demanded the release of the Epstein files. Now that 20,000 documents have been released, many raising questions about Donald Trump, they're shrugging.

item.title: Pine Labs gets warm market welcome on $440M India IPO despite a valuation trim
item.description: Pine Labs, backed by PayPal and Mastercard, gained 14% on its market debut.

item.title: Photoshop ou Excel sur un Chromebook ? Google a une arme pour (enfin) faire tourner les apps Windows
item.description: Google relance Cameyo, sa solution pour « streamer » les apps Windows sur ChromeOS. L'objectif : faire sauter le « verrou applicatif » qui empêche les entreprises de quitter Windows.

item.title: What you see is how you feel: how smarter displays shape the way we work and feel
item.description: The role of smarter monitors in reducing strain and supporting wellness in today’s digital-first workplaces.

item.title: Black Friday PC portables : la sélection des 12 meilleures offres sur les laptops bureautiques et gaming d’Apple, Asus, MSI…
item.description: Besoin d’un nouvel ordinateur portable ? Que vous recherchiez une machine bureautique ou un modèle taillé pour le gaming, il y en a pour tous les goûts durant l’avant-première du Black Friday. Les marques phares comme Apple, Asus, HP, Lenovo ou encore MSI affichent déjà de belles réductions, pour tous les budgets et tous les usages.

item.title: Pixel 10 Pro Fold review: Google’s bet to make foldables sturdy
item.description: Google’s Pixel 10 Pro Fold improves durability with a tighter hinge, IP68 rating, a bigger battery and brighter display, but its weaker camera system compared to the Pixel 10 Pro muddy its “Pro” branding.

item.title: The UK’s broken energy system could burst its AI bubble
item.description: Outdated energy infrastructure threatens to pull the plug on Britain’s AI dream.

item.title: Ne mettez pas à jour votre Switch 2 si vous avez un dock non officiel
item.description: La dernière mise à jour de la Nintendo Switch 2, numérotée 21.0.0, semble empêcher les docks non officiels de fonctionner. De nombreux modèles sont impactés.

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader ses produits les plus populaires : les 16 offres à saisir
item.description: Xiaomi n’a pas attendu longtemps pour casser les prix lors du pré-Black Friday. De nombreux modèles phares de la marque sont concernés, même les plus récentes, comme le 15T. Dans cette sélection, vous trouverez les meilleurs produits du constructeur chinois aux meilleurs prix.

item.title: Why You’ve Seen Way Less ‘Wicked: For Good’ Press Memes and Way More Merch
item.description: Holding space has given up space for a lot more bizarre brand collaborations.

item.title: Akira ransomware is now targeting Nutanix VMs - and scoring big rewards
item.description: Akira ransomware hackers are expanding their reach - and increasing their profits.

item.title: 11 Best Android Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Shopping for a phone can be an ordeal. That’s why we’ve tested almost every Android phone, from the smartest to the cheapest—even phones that fold—to find the ones worth your money.

item.title: The Running Man is a propulsive tribute to ’80s action movies
item.description: When The Running Man was first published in 1982 under Stephen King's Richard Bachman pseudonym, the United States was just beginning to feel the impacts of then-president Ronald Reagan's neoliberal economic policies. Under Reaganomics, massive tax breaks for the wealthy and deep cuts to social safety programs like food stamps and Medicaid drastically intensified income […]...

item.title: Counting Renaissance butts in Rome with the Meta Ray-Ban Display
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. It's a truth universally acknowledged that […]...

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (November 14)
item.description: The weekend has arrived, and these are the new movies and shows you'll want to watch before Monday rolls around.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, November 15 (game #1391)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, November 15 (game #888)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, November 15 (game #622)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: This simple map can help New Yorkers in need find food
item.description: Dora.nyc turns a labyrinthine system of community fridges, shelters, and more into an easy-to-read resource. As a community organizer in New York City, Sharifa Khan spends a lot of time visiting food distribution hubs, community gardens, and local shelters. While speaking with community members, she often encounters the same issue: people want to get involved in volunteering, but they’re not sure where to start. So, Khan decided to make a tool to address that—and it couldn’t have come at a more important moment....

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs sans fil, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Apple AirPods, Sony, JBL Charge, Marshall, Nothing, Bowers & Wilkins... Les grandes marques de l'audio bradent leurs écouteurs, casques, enceintes, barres de son et autres pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres pour vous faire plaisir.

item.title: Bbox fit : tout ce qu’il faut savoir sur la box internet pas chère de Bouygues Telecom
item.description: Éligible à la fibre de Bouygues Telecom sans pour autant vouloir dépenser des mille et des cents dans l'abonnement internet ? La Bbox fit est l'offre fibre la moins chère de l'opérateur, elle s'accompagne d'une box internet en Wi-Fi 6. Voici tout ce qu'il faut savoir à son sujet.

item.title: ‘This is the right time to retire’: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon steps down. Retail giant names new boss
item.description: The change in leadership follows a similar sequence of past transitions at the company, with McMillon saying on for a while in an advisory capacity. There’s a new sheriff in Bentonville.

item.title: These are the only early Black Friday earbuds and headphones deals worth buying – and I know because I tested them all (and rated them highly) in 2025
item.description: On Black Friday, there are earbuds deals that save you a bit of money, and there are genuine bargains –so let's go for option two, shall we?
